Help:Node.title: Armorsmith
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: armorsmith
Important Commands: forge
As an armorsmith, you can make armors out of metal including chestplates, helmets, and much more.
Your first step is to find the smithy. From the commons go NORTH two paces, then EAST and SOUTH. Here you will see an anvil, a forge, and a blacksmith. You can 'ASK BLACKSMITH' and he will provide a list of what he sells. You need a rod, and a hammer of any type.
Now you can type 'FORGE MY ROD USING MY HAMMER, ANVIL' - this will pop up a list of current options. (This list increases the more you learn of the profession). If you wanted to make a helmet, for example, you would now type 'FORGE MY ROD INTO HELMET USING MY HAMMER, ANVIL'. This begins the process of your item's creation. Some items can be further forged. To see if your helmet is able to be altered further type 'FORGE MY HELMET USING MY HAMMER, ANVIL'. If no options appear, the most you can make is that helmet.
For further assistance contact fellow armorsmiths in game
See Also: manipulation, roleplaying, weaponsmith
